## TsConfigJson.CompilerOptions.jsxFactory property

Specify the JSX factory function to use when targeting React JSX emit, e.g. `React.createElement` or `h`<!-- -->.

Requires TypeScript version 2.1 or later.

 'React.createElement'

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
jsxFactory?: string;
```
